_description: A letter from a lover to his mistress — 59 lines in six stanzas

BodDou95.First Lines:
ffair fresshest erþly creatureThat euere the sonne
                    ouershone…
BodDou95.Last Lines:
…Certes y can not elles saynebut deþ y may not
                    stert

Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.
